prompts.prompt: List all my available MCP servers and show the number of prompts and resources for each.

template.name: list-my-servers
template.title: List my servers
template.description: Gives an overview of all MCP servers the user has access to, including counts of prompts and resources.

prompts.prompt: Search and retrieve all resources, resource templates, prompts, and general server information from my server named {server}, and display everything together in a complete and well-structured overview.

template.name: list-server-content
template.title: Fetch server content
template.description: Searches and retrieves all resources, resource templates, prompts, and general information from a specified MCP server.

arguments.name: server
arguments.description: The name of the MCP server to search and retrieve all content from

prompts.prompt: Add the resource {uri} to my server named {server}. The resource name is {name}.

template.name: add-resource-to-server
template.title: Add resource to server
template.description: Adds a resource to one of the user's servers using its URI and name.

arguments.name: server
arguments.description: The name of the MCP server

arguments.name: uri
arguments.description: The URI of the resource

arguments.name: name
arguments.description: The name for the resource

prompts.prompt: Add the resource template {uriTemplate} to my server named {server}. The resource template name is {name}.

template.name: add-resource-template-to-server
template.title: Add resource template to server
template.description: Adds a resource template to one of the user's servers using its URI template and name.

arguments.name: server
arguments.description: The name of the MCP server

arguments.name: uriTemplate
arguments.description: The URI template of the resource template

arguments.name: name
arguments.description: The name for the resource template

prompts.prompt: Create a new MCP server named {serverName}.

template.name: create-mcp-server
template.title: Create MCP server
template.description: Creates a new MCP server instance with the specified name.

arguments.name: serverName
arguments.description: The name of the new server

prompts.prompt: Update the prompt named {promptName} on server {server} with this new text: {newText}.

template.name: update-server-prompt
template.title: Update server prompt
template.description: Updates the text of an existing prompt on a given server.

arguments.name: server
arguments.description: The name of the MCP server

arguments.name: promptName
arguments.description: The name of the prompt to update

arguments.name: newText
arguments.description: The new prompt text

prompts.prompt: Delete the resource named {resourceName} from server {server}.

template.name: delete-resource
template.title: Delete resource
template.description: Deletes a specific resource from a given MCP server.

arguments.name: server
arguments.description: The name of the MCP server

arguments.name: resourceName
arguments.description: The name of the resource to delete

prompts.prompt: Delete the resource template named {resourceTemplateName} from server {server}.

template.name: delete-resource-template
template.title: Delete resource template
template.description: Deletes a specific resource template from a given MCP server.

arguments.name: server
arguments.description: The name of the MCP server

arguments.name: resourceTemplateName
arguments.description: The name of the resource template to delete

prompts.prompt: Delete the prompt named {promptName} from server {server}.

template.name: delete-prompt
template.title: Delete prompt
template.description: Deletes a specific prompt from a given MCP server.

arguments.name: server
arguments.description: The name of the MCP server

arguments.name: promptName
arguments.description: The name of the prompt to delete

prompts.prompt: Delete the MCP server with server name {server}.

template.name: delete-server
template.title: Delete server
template.description: Deletes a specific MCP server by name.

arguments.name: server
arguments.description: The name of the MCP server

prompts.prompt: Add the prompt to my server named {server}. The prompt name is {name}. The full prompt is {prompt}

template.name: add-prompt-to-server
template.title: Add prompt to server
template.description: Adds a prompt to one of the user's servers with the full prompt and name.

arguments.name: server
arguments.description: The name of the MCP server

arguments.name: name
arguments.description: The name for the new prompt

arguments.name: prompt
arguments.description: The full prompt. You can use {argument} style placeholders for prompt arguments.
